name: Chicken Away!
description:
This is a incomplete game for the Game Boy system. A little chicken was very hungry. Suddenly, She saw a doughnut factory in the distance. She begin running to there in excitement. But annoying insects keep getting in the way! Help Chicken though 7 levels to reach to the doughnut factory. This little Chicken only has one request: DOUGHNUTS!!! So get ready for get her doughnuts! You clear a level by getting a doughnut. 

Controls: use the W, A, S, D keys to move. Press Space to jump. Press N to shoot eggs. (!!!)

Waring: This game was made by a Chicken, so the game is dummy. :P
